message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $13,500. I think it would be incredibly useful for you, and it's a fantastic deal.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Could we possibly meet somewhere in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth significantly more to me than that. How about we meet at $12,000? I'm confident you won't regret it.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I am able to offer $11,000. This feels like a fair compromise.
